item.title: Screenleap Screen Sharing
item.description: Screenleap is a free service that lets you share your screen from any device with a browser, including tablets and smartphones. No software downloads, installs, or sign ups are required. May come in handy for people doing customer support or testing sessions where participant software installation could be an issue. http://www.screenleap.com/
